WorkItem.Description: The problem is that I use Sheetnode module (http://drupal.org/project/sheetnode), which also requires the installation of PHPExcel library, resulting in duplicity. To solve the problem, PHPExcel should allow setting a path for the TCPDF library, allowing the sharing of library use with third parties. The Sheetnode has this feature, but the version that comes with TCPDF PHPExcel is old, not supported by Sheetnode ... : (
WorkItem.Summary: Fatal error: Cannot redeclare class TCPDF

Comments.Message: This is actually in the pipeline for release 1.7.8, when we'll no longer be distributing tcPDF with PHPExcel, but simply providing wrappers for tcPDF, mPDF and domPDF all using a configurable path to the chosen library.
Thank you for your answer! This is great news. Let's wait for the new release.

Wrappers for tcPDF, DomPDF and mPDF are now defined and use of of configurable setting now allows selection of PDF renderer at run-time. With no PDF rendering library bundled with PHPExcel, users may install their own choice of library and define the path to that library, or choose to use PDF libraries installed by other scripts.
